body:
Comment 4 by **Paul.A.Lalonde**: 
No, I don't get the same from the command line, which caused me a pile of grief finding
this in the first place - I could run the commands by hand and have them succeed, but
not from within the Makefile.  I just tested it again, and found the same.
Oddly, the makefile quotes the second parameter to the cp on the following line.
